content: The intValue() method delegates its job to the Integer.parseInt() method. The main method could have called Integer.parseInt() directly; the intValue() method simply makes the main() method slightly more readable.
stemmed: the intvalu ( ) method deleg job integer.parseint ( ) method . the main method could call integer.parseint ( ) directli ; intvalu ( ) method simpli make main ( ) method slightli readabl .
